extendedInfo.description: Itâs time to have a life full of taste and delights. Cup Cake Factory will take you to the deepness of taste where you will feel everything tasty and sweet. This game is user-friendly for both kids and adults. The sweet yummy nature of the game is itself a plus point and provides a charm for users to play it.Cup Cake Factory is dress up game but this time you are not to dress any fairies or princess. This time you need to dress up cakes and make them delicious and look beautiful. You will enhance your creation skills and colorful imagination. You design your own cakes with fruitful decorations and much more. The game just brings you a handful of taste and desserts loved by kids and even the bigger ones.Decorate cakes with anything you want and make them delicious and worth of eating with excitement. Decorate them with different creams, candles, cherries and put them in beautiful and colorful baskets. You can also put extra toppings of chocolates, candies and icing. Create brownies for you and your loved ones.***Top Features***â Modify cakes with different toppings and decoration accessories.â Different colorful and interesting backgrounds to keep the interest intact.â Once the cake is ready you can save it in gallery or your SD card.The taste is on your smart phones now. Get Cup Cake Factory and decorate cakes with different toppings and make them delightful. Make birthday cakes with different flavors and accessories to make your loved ones smile once you present them with the image you have saved after modifying cakes.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.
